law_name: THE PROVINCIAL SERVICE TRIBUNALS (EXTENSION OF PROVISIONS OF THE CONSTITUTION) ACT

sections.body: (1) This Act may be called the Provincial Service Tribunals (Extension of Provisions of the Constitution) Act, 1974. (2) It shall come into force at once.

sections.section_title: Provisions of Article 212 (2) to extend to Provincial Service Tribunals
sections.body: The provisions of clause (2) of Article 212 of the Constitution of the Islamic Republic of Pakistan shall extend to the Service Tribunals respectively established under Acts of the Provincial Assemblies for Balochistan, the North-West Frontier Province, the Punjab and Sind.
